AbstractEnactable.java

00001 
00002 package ajc;
00003 
00004 import ajc.data.*;
00005 
00006 /*
00007  * Since constructors are never inherited, acj must generate a 
00008  * constructor for each Enactable initializing factory.
00009  */
00010 
00011 public abstract class AbstractEnactable implements Enactable {
00012     protected DataFactory factory;
00013 
00014     protected Data fail() throws Failed {
00015         throw new Failed();
00016     }
00017     protected Data raise(Data data) throws Exceptional {
00018         throw new Exceptional(data);
00019     }
00020 
00021     protected Data catchExceptional(Exception e) throws Exception {
00022         if (e instanceof Exceptional) 
00023             return ((Exceptional)e).getData();
00024         if (e instanceof Failed)
00025             throw (Failed)e;
00026         if (e instanceof ClassCastException)
00027             return factory.makeEmpty(); 
00028         throw e;
00029     }
00030 
00031     protected void catchFailed(Exception e) throws Exception {
00032         if (!(e instanceof Failed))
00033             throw e;
00034     }
00035 }
